tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE movies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Movies (
  movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  release_date DATE,
  director VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)
CREATE TABLE movie (movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), release_date DATE, genre VARCHAR(50), director VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE actor (actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), age INT, nationality VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE movie_cast (movie_id INT, actor_id INT, role VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY (movie_id, actor_id), FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(movie_id), FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES actor(actor_id));
CREATE TABLE movie_review (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, movie_id INT, rating FLOAT, review_text TEXT, reviewer_name VARCHAR(100), review_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(movie_id));
CREATE TABLE Movies ( movie_id INT, title VARCHAR(255), director VARCHAR(255), release_date DATE, rating FLOAT )
CREATE TABLE Actors ( actor_id INT, name VARCHAR(255), birth_date DATE, gender VARCHAR(10) )
CREATE TABLE Genres ( genre_id INT, genre_name VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE MovieGenres ( movie_id INT, genre_id INT )
CREATE TABLE Reviews ( review_id INT, movie_id INT, reviewer_name VARCHAR(100), rating FLOAT, review_text TEXT )
